home.searchHeader: Citizen verification: search for a property
home.searchContent: Begin citizen verification by entering the address of the property that they own

userManagement.editWarningMessage: Editing multiple users is not allowed.

userDeactivateModal.title: Deactivate user?
userDeactivateModal.bodyText: Please provide the reason for deactivating this user
userDeactivateModal.bodyMultipleText: Provide a reason for deactivating multiple users. The reason must apply to all selected accounts
userDeactivateModal.deactivateTextAreaMessage: The reason above will be applied to all users selected.

accessGrantModal.title: Grant request?
accessGrantModal.bodyText: Are you sure that you want to grant this userâ€™s request?
accessGrantModal.bodyMultipleText: Are you sure that you want to grant requests for

accessRejectModal.title: Reject request?
accessRejectModal.bodyText: Please provide the reason for rejecting the access request of this user
accessRejectModal.bodyMultipleText: Please provide the reason for rejecting the access requests of multiple users
accessRejectModal.rejectTextAreaMessage: The reason above will be applied to all users selected.

requestAccessBanner.title: Request Access to VHERS PIN Admin Portal
requestAccessBanner.description: You will need to provide some additional details before accessing this application. Complete the request details form below to request access.

requestForm.alert: Please only request access if you have been instructed to do so.

formInputs.reasonPlaceHolder: Describe the reason for wanting access to this application

requestSubmitMessage.successMessage: Your request to access VHERS PIN Admin Portal has been submitted. A notification will be sent to you via email once the request is processed.
requestSubmitMessage.failureMessage: The system has encountered an issue and your request could not be submitted. Please try again later or contact the system administrator below.
requestSubmitMessage.requestExist: A request already exists. Please contact the system administrator below

propertySearch.searchBoxError: Begin typing address to get started. Partial addresses accepted

expirePINConfirmationModal.title: Expire access code
expirePINConfirmationModal.body: The current access code will be void and the property owner will need to request a new access code to manage the VHERS portal.

expirePINSuccessModal.title: Access code has been expired
expirePINSuccessModal.body: The property owner will not be able to access VHERS system until a new access code is requested.

expirePINFailureModal.title: Expiring access code failed
expirePINFailureModal.body: There was a problem. Try again later.

propertyDetails.noSearchResultMsg: No result available. Try a different address and search again.
propertyDetails.noDataFoundMsg: No data available for the selected property.
propertyDetails.searchResultMsg: Select an address to view property details
propertyDetails.multipleTitlesAlertText: Multiple title numbers are available for this address. Scroll down to view all title numbers.

searchResults.scrollMessage: Scroll down to view more results

pinHistoryFailureModal.title: Viewing access code history failed
pinHistoryFailureModal.body: There was a problem. Try again later.

viewPINModal.title: View Access Code
viewPINModal.noLivePINMag: There is no valid access code.

regeneratePINModal.title: Regenerate Access Code
regeneratePINModal.contentMsg: A new access code will be generated and the previous access code will be void. At least one of the following two fields must be filled to proceed.
regeneratePINModal.successModalMsgPhoneAndEmail: A new access code has been created and will be sent to the property owner via SMS and email soon.
regeneratePINModal.successModalMsgPhone: A new access code has been created and will be sent to the property owner via SMS soon.
regeneratePINModal.successModalMsgEmail: A new access code has been created and will be sent to the property owner via email soon.
regeneratePINModal.failureModalMag: There was a problem. Try again later.
regeneratePINModal.phoneFailureModalMessage: This is not a valid phone number. Please try again.
regeneratePINModal.emailFailureModalMessage: This is not a valid email address. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.content: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved. Please try again later or contact the system administrator below.

serverError.title: Internal Server Error
serverError.content: We encountered an error and cannot fulfill this request. Please try again later or contact the system administrator below.
